meanings.definition: A tropical tree of the magnolia family, known for its fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: The champac tree in the garden smells lovely.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy the sweet scent of champac flowers.
meanings.sent3: The champac tree decided to wear perfume to smell even better.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the champac tree, spreading joy everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The champac flowers danced in the breeze, filling the air with their fragrance.

meanings.definition: The fragrant flowers of the champac tree.
meanings.sent1: I picked a champac flower to put in a vase.
meanings.sent2: The champac flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The champac flower giggled when the bee tickled its petals.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as a champac flower in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The champac flower whispered secrets to the wind, carrying its scent far and wide.
